message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You got lucky, now it's my turn to get lucky
You got lucky, now it's my turn to get smart!
You think you're smart, but I'm not done yet!
You're not done yet? Let's wrap this up!
You think you're wrapping it up, but I'm just getting started!
You're really enjoying this, aren't you? Let's end it already!
I'm not tired yet, let's see how long you can keep this up!
You're enjoying the game, but I'm starting to get desperate!
You're desperate, but I'm not giving in yet!
I'm not giving in, but I'm starting to lose hope!
You're running out of options, and I'm just getting started!
I'm out of options, you win. Congratulations.
